official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for standard forms under the Medicare Program for certifications of medical necessity and certifications of terminal illness.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to publish a standard form for certificates of medical necessity and certificates of terminal illness.
